cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-2770

description: sudo 1.3.5 through 1.7.10p5 and 1.8.0 through 1.8.6p6, when running on systems without /proc or the sysctl function with the tty_tickets option enabled, does not properly validate the controlling terminal device, which allows local users with sudo permissions to hijack the authorization of another terminal via vectors related to connecting to the standard input, output, and error file descriptors of another terminal.  NOTE: this is one of three closely-related vulnerabilities that were originally assigned CVE-2013-1776, but they have been SPLIT because of different affected versions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-2776

NOTE: this is one of three closely-related vulnerabilities that were originally assigned CVE-2013-1776, but they have been SPLIT because of different affected versions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-2777

description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the O3D plug-in in Google Chrome OS before 26.0.1410.57 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to improper management of ownership relationships involving Elements and DrawElements.

description: Google Chrome OS before 26.0.1410.57 does not properly enforce origin restrictions for the O3D and Google Talk plug-ins, which allows remote attackers to bypass the domain-whitelist protection mechanism via a crafted web site, a different vulnerability than CVE-2013-2835.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-2834

description: Google Chrome OS before 26.0.1410.57 does not properly enforce origin restrictions for the O3D and Google Talk plug-ins, which allows remote attackers to bypass the domain-whitelist protection mechanism via a crafted web site, a different vulnerability than CVE-2013-2834.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-2835

description: SQL injection vulnerability in ZAPms 1.41 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the pid parameter to product.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-3050

description: The TrustZone kernel, when used in conjunction with a certain Motorola build of Android 4.1.2, on Motorola Razr HD, Razr M, and Atrix HD devices with the Qualcomm MSM8960 chipset does not verify the association between a certain physical-address argument and a memory region, which allows local users to unlock the bootloader by using kernel mode to perform crafted 0x9 and 0x2 SMC operations, a different vulnerability than CVE-2013-2596.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-3051

description: Lexmark Markvision Enterprise before 1.8 provides a diagnostic interface on TCP port 9789, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code, change the configuration, or obtain sensitive fleet-management information via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-3055

description: The web console in Apache ActiveMQ before 5.8.0 does not require authentication, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information or cause a denial of service via HTTP requests.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-3060

description: Multiple buffer overflows in ActUWzd.dll 1.0.0.1 in Mitsubishi MX Component 3, as distributed in Citect CitectFacilities 7.10 and CitectScada 7.10r1, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long string, as demonstrated by a long WzTitle property value to a certain ActiveX control.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-3075

description: The crypto API in the Linux kernel through 3.9-rc8 does not initialize certain length variables, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information from kernel stack memory via a crafted recvmsg or recvfrom system call, related to the hash_recvmsg function in crypto/algif_hash.c and the skcipher_recvmsg function in crypto/algif_skcipher.c.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-3076

description: Opera before 12.15 does not properly block top-level domains in Set-Cookie headers, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by leveraging control of a different web site in the same top-level domain.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-3210

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Opera before 12.15 has unknown impact and attack vectors, related to a "moderately severe issue."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-3211

description: The Active Record component in Ruby on Rails 2.3.x, 3.0.x, 3.1.x, and 3.2.x does not ensure that the declared data type of a database column is used during comparisons of input values to stored values in that column, which makes it easier for remote attackers to conduct data-type injection attacks against Ruby on Rails applications via a crafted value, as demonstrated by unintended interaction between the "typed XML" feature and a MySQL database.
